meta.label: Deep learning on images
meta.description: Use a pre-trained model to score images or extract features. You can retrain generic models to specialize them on a particular set of images.  ⚠️ This plugin is now \"partially superseded\", we recommend using the native [image classification](https://doc.dataiku.com/dss/latest/machine-learning/computer-vision/index.html) capabilities instead.",
meta.author: Dataiku (Henri Chabert)
